# type

**Instance Property**

The type of workout event.

## Declaration

```swift
var type: HKWorkoutEventType { get }
```

## Discussion

For a description of possible events, see [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKWorkoutEventType].

## Getting property data

- **dateInterval**: The time and duration of the event.
- **metadata**: The metadata associated with the workout event.
